title: Taliyah's Balance State @Riot
body:
With the upcoming assassin update, along with her current position on the mid tier list currently, I am concerned she's going to be too weak in the patches to come. 

I think a lot of the nerfs have gone a little far.

What is your position on her balance, and is she on your radar at all in the patches to come?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Revert her to pre-6.14.
There, literally every single issue with her is fixed perfectly.
Z Klein just doesn't know how to design a champion with a kit that isn't inherently broken. That's why all his champions had to be gutted to oblivion.
Just looking for a rioter to speak on direction of her, or if shes gonna be left in her current state.

She could seriously use some buffs to her early game. Her late game I am finding can be solid as long as you can snowball even a little bit. But laning for her is pretty difficult now that her Q minion damage has been removed.
She is weak now. SHe was strong on release because of high risk / reward but with the nerf she just makes it easier for the enemy to kill her
